attributes.action: Get Channel M to bring back Frank Sidebottoms proper telly show and pay him millions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Channel M (SKY 203) have moved franks set out of the Studio. WHY? We want this service back. The only reason most of us tune in to Channel M on Friday nights is to watch Franks show, as well as the city centre social. We ask the Prime Minister to get Channel M to see sense, for the community spirit of Timperley, Manchester and the world. Channel M is a great local channel and we embrace the fact that we have a local TV station dealing with local issues. This is brilliant stuff. However, we understand that mistakes can be made by them and by me. Please put this right.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
